title: gullobhai
author: gullobhai
content: DEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ WHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think you are on the wrong section OP.  You could move this thread to altcoin discussion since you are talking about nft which i believe belong to that topic section.Btw not sure how to be expert on nft, but clearly there are ways on how to learn nft like making one, or uploading it on chain or in platforms.  You can do one in opensea.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ You can easily sell them mostly on the NFT marketplaces like opensea. It's the most known and common marketplace for NFTs and if you're looking for a "different" way then you can just go back to the usual method of selling it through P2P but this is a harder way. It's like selling directly to those people that have the same interest as you with the NFT that you're trying to sell.Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMWHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)I'll give you an hint. A simple rock NFT was sold for $1.7M.

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: NFT was only a picture with PNG format. It's basically a usual wallpaper but since it was using minting contract and then the wallpaper can use it to minting NFT and the wallpaper will have a unique code generated from the minting contract. So, if you wanna create your own NFT and then you can try to search some articles that will told you about how to generate your own NFT like this. You need only wallpaper with PNG format to be able to minting it. https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/market-sectors/financials/non-fungible-tokens/nft-minting/

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: NFT industry is already saturated and even the biggest brand NFT value is already not worth-it than before. I don’t see any specific category of NFT that excels on the current market because all of them is going down so if you are just planning to enter in hope to earn huge money to your new NFT idea then I suggest to postponed it for now because today is not the best day to release any investment opportunities in the market.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Only a few people will buy and waste their money investing NFT projects and I wasn't sure if your NFTs can also be attractive or something. Don't get me wrong but doing this is not a profitable idea. Instead of making NFTs hoping for something huge, better make yourselves comfortable in buying/accumulating potential coins rather than making yours. In this way, you are making yourself pretty easy, and yes, less hassle on your side. Whether you like it or not, investors will soon forget about NFT and your project will no longer be seen.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Let me be honest with you.No matter how good is your "NFTs" if you don't have power or connection, you're never can sell the NFTs. Most people who are success sell their own NFTs with high price or the collection is the one who have power (Follower) or paid promotion to some influencer.The reality people bought NFTs for flipping the money, that's why they targeting NFTs from a someone who have power. So, If you don't have power (Influence) you cannot sell any NFTs even your NFTs is really good.One another things, the momentum of NFTs is already reaching the peek. You can check by google trend.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ WHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)You need to know that not all NFT are sellables and you cannot expect people to buy your art if you announce it as NFT since you need to be good on hyping up on your creation. And also you need a good reputation so that many people will get attracted on what you are offering to them so better work out on your portfolio first and create demands thru your supporter so maybe for now its better for you to build a community first before planning to rush all things here.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ WHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)You have to understand what NFT is all about and not all NFTs are profitable, some NFTs also require huge capital and still the profit is not guaranteed. If you are still new with the NFTs, better to keep on searching and look for every kind of NFTs. If you already have the idea now you can decide on where to put your money, NFTs are good but I think invest only on those who have the real usage in this market because most of the NFTs are just here without any utility and that's why most of them failed to rise.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: You need to bet with your luck to be able to make your NFT become success or even for only selling single NFT in opensea. There are bunch of NFTs issued by thousands of people anytime. I guess that if you can use this as a trial but you must not have a high expectation for your NFT to be bought by others. The fact that only popular NFTs that issued by the big companies that able to become popular even some have been dumped so hard on its floor price. NFT is pure a luck for personal creator.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ WHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)NFT fans have started to decrease unlike before who were so enthusiastic about NFT, even I have made several NFTs to try their luck, but the result is that there is no interest, I even publish my NFT to Opensea, where Opensea is a place for sellers and buyers to gather there to transact NFT, I think you're too late to seize the moment...

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. Before next question please press this button once!Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMWHERE I CAN SELL NFT There are many marketplaces like OpenSea, LooksRare, Magic Eden, X2Y2 where can sell your nft.Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMWHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)According to This website, 3D NFTs are more valuable than 2D nft as it can be used in metaverse games and movies.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: gullobhai on August 29, 2022, 06:55:07 AMDEAR COMMUNITY I HAVE SOME QUESTION ABOUT NFT. WHAT IS WAY TO MAKE OURSELF AS NFT EXPORT/ WHERE I CAN SELL NFT WITH DIFFERIANTE WAY/ HOW I MADE AWESOME NFT/ WHICH NFT HAVE WORTH(SIMPLE,3D,ANIMATION)Of course, the more complicated the design of your NFT (3d and or animation), the more it will fetch in the market. But the question is, how good is your design and graphics and it is something unique in the market? Because as others have said, it seems to have been saturated as well, just like the previous hype on altcoin market and then it will suddenly die down. And as far was we have seen, if you are one of those early birds then for sure he will more money out of it, jut saying. You might want to have it here though: https://opensea.io/ - the biggest NFT marketplace.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: I think most NFT that could gain success actually coming from luck, their NFT suddenly gets famous and therefore their value increase, it's just that. moreover right now NFT trend seems kinda fading, most NFT has lost their volumes so I don't think gaining success at this current trend will become easy feat. after all, NFT is just like branding, if you couldn't make your brand stands out than the other then your NFT will just become valueless.

comments.author: monineklutak
comments.body: The trend of NFT seems to be going down, there is no good news about NFT, maybe because the bear market makes NFT not worth it anymore, but indeed NFT is still very new in the world, and if NFT is hype again then of course you can invest some NFT from Mobox or APE

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: I believe if you create an useful NFT which have a practical application it's more likely to lead you to success than creating default NFTs which are just a image/banner/picture/logo. Or you can apply to work for NFT projects and platforms, so you are assured to get paid by a company for your work, instead of putting your works for sale, without any guarantee someone is going to purchase them or not, what I must say it's really hard to sell, because there is a lot of competition on this field and a lot of people creating very similar NFTs for sale. You have to create original and innovative content to stand out among so many creators.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: I think you need to forget that, at this time not only the crypto market but the NFT market has also dropped drastically so there is no purchasing power there, if anyone is buying and selling on NFT it is only their connection and community, no more people rich people put their money in NFT because they are afraid of losing their money, just watch the NFT transactions on the ETH network dim, there are only community network connections that make the NFT trading volume come alive when in fact the NFT market is dead

comments.author: bocyaj
comments.body: Now the investors had moved from crypto currency trading to NFT.It was the cause of the NFT rise now a days.Many NFT had given the huge profit to the most of the investors,which included massive high profit more than 10000$.People who had not holding their funds in crypto for the long profit.They made some massive investment in the NFT.The most important one of the NFT is,you need to verify the correct value of the NFT by checking the certain NFT is the true one.Because many fake NFT will be survive to scam our money.

comments.author: Pterosaur
comments.body: Most NFTs on marketplaces are scam, even opensea is infected with lots of scam NFTs as we speak, this day anyone can create 3D images and Animations then turn into NFTs to sell, I don't blame them for this I only blame idiots that are buying.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: For creating your own NFTs, you have to first need some kind of original image for the NFT. That's the first step. You can take your time. Maybe a piece of art that you or someone you know made. You can take a picture of it, crop it, make it look nice, and then upload it to imgurStep of creating your own NFTs1. Create a web wallet address. Link to web wallet address https://dogermint.com/dogeparty/#62. Have at least 4 Doge and 1 XDPThis is the guide for creating your NFTs. https://dogermint.com/dogeparty/ the guide will give you all the answers you need to know about NFTs
